articles.title: Sendbird, an artificial intelligence (AI) communication platform, announced on the 14th that it has ..
articles.author: Wonho-seop
articles.summary: Sendbird launched 'Omnipresent AI Agent,' a new AI solution that analyzes customer behavior in real-time and responds proactively. This solution aims to improve customer experience by providing preemptive support across various channels and has shown promising results in increased conversion rates and reduced customer service inquiries among global customers.

articles.title: Primark Swindon and Krispy Kreme launch new collection
articles.author: Joe Green
articles.summary: Primark and Krispy Kreme have collaborated to launch a new collection of clothing and accessories aimed at Gen Z. The collection includes 19 different pieces, featuring items such as sliders, a bucket hat, and a rucksack, with prices ranging from £3.50 to £18. The collection is available in Primark stores and via their Click & Collect service.

articles.title: Wrestle a luchador? Airbnb to offer 22,000 experiences
articles.author: Christopher Reynolds
articles.summary: Airbnb has introduced "Airbnb Services," a new program with 10 initial categories including services like hair styling and massage, expanding beyond its core lodging business. The company also relaunched its experiences program and introduced a redesigned app to integrate these new offerings, available in 260 cities with vetted service providers.

articles.title: 28 Products To Help You Sharpen Those Makeup Skills
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: The article features the introduction and promotion of multiple new makeup and beauty products. These include Neutrogena's makeup-correcting stick, Glossier Boy Brow for voluminous brows, Elizabeth Mott's eye and face primers, Catrice under-eye brightener, various products of Maybelline like Instant Age Rewind concealer and BB cream and E.l.f.'s Halo Glow Liquid Filter. Each product description details its unique selling points and how it enhances the makeup routine.

articles.title: Cassie Ventura testifies in Sean 'Diddy' Combs sex trafficking trial
articles.summary: WeAreIowa streaming service is available on phones through the WeAreIowa app.

articles.title: 53 Of The Best Father's Day Gifts To Give In 2025
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Several new products and services are introduced as gift ideas, including the Fellow Aiden Precision Drip Coffee Maker and Oxo's compact Brew Rapid Brewer for coffee lovers, and New Balance 990 V6 sneakers for stylish dads. These items appear to be recent releases or innovations in their respective categories.

articles.title: New Moto G stylus on sale in Canada for $600
articles.summary: Motorola's new G Stylus is available for $600 on the company's website and will soon be available from Canadian carriers. Motorola indicates the phone's availability at select carriers and national retailers starting May 13.

articles.title: Innovative Eyewear Inc. Reports Q1 2025 Unaudited Financial Results
articles.author: Innovative Eyewear
articles.summary: Innovative Eyewear Inc., developer of smart eyewear under the Lucyd®, Nautica®, Eddie Bauer® and Reebok® brands, announced its Q1 2025 Unaudited financial results. The announcement suggests potential insights into the performance or new developments related to these brands' eyewear products.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works' New Summer Scent Collection Will Transport You to the Italian Countryside (& Prices Start at $3)
articles.author: Kristine Fellizar
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works launched its new 'Off the Vine' collection for Summer 2025, featuring a tomato-based scent. The collection includes products like three-wick candles, body cream, body wash, fragrance mist, and hand soap. Prices for the new launch start at less than $4, with current promotions available.

articles.title: FLUENT Debuts "New York Minute" – A Bold, Exclusive Flavor for MOODS Vaporizers  May. 13, 2025 21:05
articles.summary: FLUENT Corp. has launched 'New York Minute,' a new cannabis vaporizer product under its MOODS brand, designed for adult-use consumers in New York. The product, flavored with Apple Apricot Tsunami botanical terpenes, will be available in two All-in-One device formats and sold at FLUENT New York retail locations and third-party retailers.

articles.title: This just in: These are the 14 most anticipated products of the month
articles.summary: Briogeo, Thyme & Table, Merit, and Ruggable are launching new products. These product launches are happening in May and are expected to be popular during the summer.

articles.title: Save $150 on the Dyson V7 Advanced vacuum for a limited time - now $250, was $400
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the Dyson V7 Advanced vacuum for a limited time at a discounted price of $249.99, originally $399.99. The cordless vacuum features de-tangling technology, impressive suction, transforms into a handheld vacuum, and includes a Motorbar™ Cleaner Head, Combination Tool, Mini soft dusting brush and charger. It also comes with a two-year limited warranty, money-back guarantee and 30-day return policy.

articles.title: Airbnb goes all in on everything but the bnb
articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.summary: Airbnb is launching a new product called Airbnb Services, which encompasses services accompanying home rentals, such as photography, manicures, personal trainers, and private chefs.  The company is also redoubling efforts on Airbnb Experiences, which offers tourist activities hosted by locals. Both Services and Experiences will have their own tabs in the app, aiming to integrate event planning and vacation booking.

articles.title: Google's Jellification of Android 16's Design Won't Please Everyone, but I'm a Fan
articles.author: Katie Collins
articles.summary: Google is introducing a UI overhaul called Material 3 Expressive to Android 16, Wear OS, and Google's apps. The update brings fresh colors and fonts with a focus on dynamism, springiness and bounciness. The new look was unveiled during the Android Show.

articles.title: Nok et boliginnbrudd: – De har ødelagt hele vinduskarmen
articles.author: Shawn Herheim
articles.summary: Airbnb has launched new services, including private chefs and personal trainers, alongside stays and revamped its experiences feature within a redesigned app. The new features allow users to book services and experiences, integrating them into their itineraries and providing new tools for hosts. This launch includes 10 service categories in 260 cities and upgraded experiences in over 650 cities.

articles.title: Smart Sand, Inc. Announces First Quarter 2025 Results
articles.author: Inc.
articles.summary: Smart Sand introduced a new product 623 Loader, and upgrades using 5D50s John Deere. These products are aimed to enable operational efficiencies and enhance customer value.

articles.title: Samsung Debuts Galaxy S25 Edge With Slim 5.8mm Design and AI-Focused Features
articles.author: Rob Le Febvre
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Galaxy S25, a slim smartphone with a thickness of 5.8mm. TM Roh, President and Acting Head of the Device eXperience (DX) Division at Samsung Electronics, emphasized the company's commitment to delivering premium experiences with the Galaxy S25.

articles.title: PHOTOS: Lucid Bots Sherpa drone cleans windows at First Horizon Coliseum in Greensboro
articles.author: aisley
articles.summary: Lucid Bots demonstrated their Sherpa drone pressure washing windows at First Horizon Coliseum. The Sherpa drone provides window washing services.

articles.title: Miva 10.12 Expands Ecommerce Platform with AI Search Infrastructure and No-Code Tools
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Miva, Inc. has launched Miva 10.12, a new version of their ecommerce platform. Miva 10.12 introduces new features like AI-powered product discovery through Vexture (an AI-powered search engine), flexible no-code page layouts, centralized brand styling, and improved operational visibility.

articles.title: 19 gifts for new dads ahead of Father's Day
articles.author: Claire Peltier
articles.summary: Babylist is promoting Lalabu The Dad Shirt, a hands-free baby carrier for dads. Amazon is featuring the Baby Brezza Bottle Sterilizer and Dryer Advanced, as well as the Fitbit Sense 2 Advanced Health and Fitness Smartwatch. These products are being marketed as gifts for new fathers.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Video will show you contextual AI-created ads when you pause a show
articles.author: Sam Becker
articles.summary: Amazon introduced a new AI-powered contextual advertising feature for its Prime Video platform at its 2025 Upfront event. This service dynamically generates ads based on the specific scene being viewed, enhancing Amazon's advertising capabilities. The Prime Video service has a global audience of over 300 million.

articles.title: Everyone Loves Saatva's Classic Mattress, So We Put It to the Test
articles.author: Luke Guillory
articles.summary: Saatva has launched the Saatva Classic mattress, a luxury innerspring mattress known for its quality, customer service, and firm support. The Saatva Classic is priced competitively at $2,000 for a queen-sized mattress and offers white glove delivery and a 365-day return policy. The mattress features a quilted cotton pillow top, lumbar support zone, and two layers of coils designed for pressure relief, base support, and cool sleeping.

articles.title: 43 Products Giving 'I Am A Pretty Princess" Energy
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The content highlights the launch and introduction of several new beauty and lifestyle products. Wild Iris Musk Body Wash is presented as a spring-themed version of a popular body wash, while E.l.f. Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm is introduced as an affordable alternative to high-end lip balms. Eos has released Cashmere Vanilla Cashmere Whipped Oil Body Butter, a new form of their popular lotion. Other product launches include Clinique Pop Lip + Cheek Tinted Oil and Tree Hut Vanilla Hand Wash with hyaluronic acid. Amazon brand Cushionaire launched dainty lace detail sneakers.

articles.title: Perfume Designer: Turn Anything Into A Bottled Fragrance
articles.author: Sarah Aspler
articles.summary: A 'Perfume Generator' service transforms user-specified scents into high-end fragrances, including a name and aesthetic. The service bottles user's ideal scent fantasy.

articles.title: Sour Patch Kids And Swedish Fish Introduce First-Ever Glow-In-The-Dark Gummy Candy
articles.author: The Wine Press
articles.summary: Mondelēz International launched glow-in-the-dark Sour Patch Kids and Swedish Fish in March. The company partnered with Snapchat to introduce a blacklight filter for customers to share their glow experience online. The glow effect is due to the use of turmeric extract in the candy.

articles.title: Sonic's New Unicorn Dreams Slush Is a Very Sweet (and Very Pretty) Summer Treat
articles.summary: Sonic has launched a new limited-time drink called Unicorn Dreams Slush, a vibrant pink cotton candy slush with blue raspberry bursting bubbles, whipped topping, and pink cotton candy sugar crystals. The slush comes with a free Unicorn Horn Straw, available in four options, and starts at $3.99 for a 20-ounce drink.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Goes on Sale on May 30. Here's All the Ordering Info.
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Samsung has officially launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thinner phone compared to other S25 models, with preorders available now and a delivery/sale date of May 30. The Galaxy S25 Edge starts at $1,100 and is available in three colors: Titanium Jetblack, Titanium Silver, and Titanium Icyblue; AT&T is offering a free 256GB model with eligible trade-ins, while Samsung offers the 512GB model for the same price as the 256GB when ordered through Samsung.com.

articles.title: Meghan Markle Says Building As Ever Has Been a 'Constant State of Recalibration'
articles.author: Vanity Fair
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's lifestyle business, As Ever, launched in April with an initial line of nine products including herbal tea, cookie mix, and jam, which sold out quickly. The company plans to evolve its product line seasonally and restock some offerings, hinting at new products coming soon.

articles.title: People Swear This OG Handheld Vacuum Is Still The Best Around And It's The Lowest Price Of The Year
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Black+Decker's Dustbuster, a handheld vacuum cleaner, has been updated with sleeker design, improved strength, and rechargeable capabilities. It's currently on sale. Users praise its effectiveness for quickly cleaning up small messes, ease of use, and features like a washable pre-filter, easy-release canister, and built-in crevice tool.

articles.title: Samsung introduces the Galaxy S25 Edge. What's different with this S-series device?
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim and durable addition to the Galaxy S series, priced at $1,099 in the US and INR Rs 1,09,999 in India. The device features a 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform, improved cooling system, and Galaxy AI integration for enhanced user experience.

articles.title: Square's New Handheld Payment Scanner Looks Like a Phone
articles.author: Boone Ashworth
articles.summary: Square launched a new handheld device called Square Handheld, designed for servers and customer service roles to collect payments and take orders. The device costs $399 and is currently available.

articles.title: Android 16 is the big Android update I've been waiting for
articles.author: Spencer Hart
articles.summary: Google's Android 16 introduces a new design language called Material 3 Expressive, aiming for a more personal and responsive user experience. This update includes features like Live Updates for glanceable information and extends its design improvements to Wear OS 6. Android 16 will be released on Pixel devices later this year.

articles.title: Samsung debuts pricey S25 Edge, kicking off wave of thin phones
articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. launched the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone, featuring a slim design, enhanced features like a titanium frame and a 200-megapixel camera. Available in the US on May 30 for $1,099, the S25 Edge aims to address customer demand for lighter and more pocket-friendly devices and it will come in black, silver and blue.

articles.title: Samsung debuts pricey S25 Edge, kicking off wave of thin phones
articles.author: Bloomberg News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone, a slimmed-down handset, set to go on sale in the US on May 30 for $1,099. This new model features a 6.7-inch screen, up to 512GB of storage, a titanium frame, and a 200-megapixel rear camera, and Samsung claims it offers all-day battery life due to AI optimizations.

articles.title: Insomnia Cookies to open first Queens location in Fresh Meadows this Saturday
articles.author: Czarinna Andres
articles.summary: Insomnia Cookies is opening a new store in Fresh Meadows, Queens, on May 17th. Customers who sign up for Insomnia Rewards in-store on the opening day will receive one free classic cookie with no purchase required. The storefront will offer in-store service, pickup and delivery options, with late-night hours extending until 1 a.m. Sunday through Wednesday and until 3 a.m. Thursday through Saturday.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils the Ultra-Thin Galaxy S25 Edge With Titanium Frame
articles.author: Erik Wesley
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a thin and light flagship smartphone featuring a titanium frame, 6.7-inch AMOLED display, and a dual-lens camera system with a 200-megapixel wide-angle sensor. Powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform, it supports Samsung's AI tools and integrates Google's Gemini AI. The Galaxy S25 Edge is available for pre-order starting at $1,099.99.

articles.title: How Artificial Intelligence Enhances Marketing Strategies: Practices & Examples
articles.author: Graphics Tech
articles.summary: Bank of America uses the AI chatbot 'Erica' which is constantly updated to interact with bank clients and handles transaction processing. Delta Airlines uses an intelligent system that classifies customer sentiment by urgency. Starbucks uses AI-powered systems to predict the lifetime value of customers. IKEA's application integrates AI to analyze room dimensions and select furniture for customers' homes using augmented reality.

articles.title: Hexaware Achieves AWS Data and Analytics Competency to Accelerate Data-driven Insights for Enterprises
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Hexaware achieved the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Data and Analytics Competency. The company's competency strengthens the company's ability to support end-to-end data transformation journeys and offer AI-first, cloud-native services for data modernization and analytics, which includes Data Strategy, Engineering Services, Data Operations, Data Management, Analytics, AI, and Business Solutions.

articles.title: Next's 'breathable' £24 summer dress that 'complements the figure'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is featuring a casual black T-Shirt dress made from breathable cotton, with a crewneck collar, twist detail to the waist and a midi-length. New Look is selling a Bright Yellow Metallic Jacquard Ruffle Trim Mini Dress.

articles.title: Review: The Ninja blender – Ninja Detect TB403 identifies ingredients automatically
articles.author: ZEEV YANAI
articles.summary: Ninja Shark introduced the Ninja Detect TB403, a food processing system and blender featuring BlendSense technology for automatic ingredient detection. The device adjusts program, speed, and duration based on detected ingredients to achieve precise textures for various recipes. The Ninja Detect is available for purchase in Israel through Sarig Electric.

articles.title: Valve will soon let you know if a game is compatible with your SteamOS device
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Valve has announced a new SteamOS Compatibility rating system for third-party SteamOS devices, designed to indicate game compatibility beyond the Steam Deck. This system will mark games as either 'SteamOS Compatible' or 'SteamOS Unsupported' in the Steam Store and Steam Client, with Lenovo Legion Go S being the first handheld gaming PC to use SteamOS.

articles.title: ThriveAI Raises $1.2M Pre-Seed, Launches First AI-Powered Junior Product Manager
articles.author: Thrive AI
articles.summary: announced its public launch of an AI-powered junior product manager after securing $1.2 million in pre-seed funding. The company aims to alleviate the pressure on product managers by providing an AI teammate capable of handling daily tasks and driving impact.

articles.title: HomeSmart Launches New MLS-Integrated, Feature-Packed Marketing Platform with Powerful Automation
articles.author: Home Smart
articles.summary: A brokerage has launched a new platform to provide agents with a dedicated design studio. The platform includes an intuitive interface to efficiently generate impactful marketing materials. The launch addresses agent feedback and concerns regarding marketing trends and emerging technology.

articles.title: Want a New $1,100 Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge for Free From AT&T? Of Course You Do.
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone on May 12. AT&T is offering a promotion where customers can get the 256GB model for free or the 512GB model for nearly free by trading in an eligible device before May 29. The phone is available in Titanium Jetblack, Titanium Silver, and Titanium Icyblue.

articles.title: Walmart takes a major step in a bold new direction
articles.author: Colette Bennett
articles.summary: Walmart has launched a new store prototype, its 'Store of the Future', in Houston featuring a modernized look, "Activated Corners" with scannable QR codes, digital price labels, and an expanded Pharmacy with a drive-thru. The store also includes a larger Vision Center, a Mother's Room, an Auto Care Center, a dollar shop, and a Grab & Go section. Walmart plans to build or convert 150 stores to this format over the next few years.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge hands-on preview: Yep, it's thin
articles.author: Alex Perry
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new ultra-thin flagship phone. The S25 Edge is available for preorder from Samsung, Amazon, and Best Buy, with a $50 discount and 256GB of bonus storage offered by Samsung; it will be available starting May 30. The phone features similar specs to other Galaxy S25 models but with a thinner design.

articles.title: Rwai Schweiz CTO Board – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: MarsCode IDE, an AI-powered coding tool, was launched to improve coding efficiency and quality. Jörg Bieri, CTO at RWAI, is driving innovation in Agentic AI solutions. These developments indicate a trend of integrating intelligent agents into everyday workflows.

articles.title: Instacart hit with lawsuit over new Fizz app
articles.author: Catherine Douglas Moran
articles.summary: Instacart launched a new standalone app called Fizz, which integrates with Partiful to facilitate group delivery orders for event hosts and guests. The app targets digitally engaged shoppers in the party-planning space, allowing customers ages 21 and older to place consolidated orders for one address.

articles.title: Oprah Winfrey reveals new book club pick: "The Emperor of Gladness" by Ocean Vuong
articles.author: CBS News
articles.summary: Oprah Winfrey reveals a new product or service. More details need to be present, but the snippet suggests a product or service launch.

articles.title: Saudi Arabia Rolls Out Custom Mobile McDonald's for Trump Visit
articles.author: Jesus Mesa
articles.summary: Saudi officials introduced a custom-built mobile McDonald's truck to welcome President Trump during his visit to Riyadh. This McDonald's truck, branded in Arabic and English, was parked outside a media hub. It is intended to cater to the presidential visit and journalists.

articles.title: Samsung debuts Galaxy S25 Edge, its slimmest Galaxy S phone yet
articles.author: Jie Ye-eun
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new ultra-slim smartphone with advanced AI capabilities. Preorders begin on Wednesday, with an official release set for May 23 in Korea and China and later in other countries. The phone is priced between 1.5 million won to 1.64 million won, with a subscription option available through the New Galaxy AI Subscription Club.

articles.title: Skincare shoppers obsessed with 'refreshing' moisturising gel perfect for summer weather
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Byoma has introduced the Moisturising Gel Cream, a lightweight, oil-free moisturizer designed to strengthen the skin barrier and hydrate the skin. Formulated with Tri-Ceramide Complex, niacinamide, and green tea, it aims to reduce redness and calm inflammation and suitable for all skin types. Avène also offers the Hydrance Aqua-Gel Hydrating Aqua Cream-in-Gel, which is tailored to sensitive skin.

articles.title: Here is when a new clothing shop is opening in Morecambe
articles.author: Michelle Blade
articles.summary: Nord Buck Brand is launching a new clothing shop in Morecambe's Plaza Shopping Arcade on May 22nd. The shop will offer men's, women's, and children's clothing and the first 15 customers will receive a welcome reward with their first purchase. Customers can visit their website to get 15% off their first order.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 falls to record low as new Edge model drops
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slimmer version of the S25, with pre-orders available from Samsung and Sky Mobile. The S25 Edge is priced at £1,000+, while Samsung is also offering discounts on existing Galaxy S25 models, including the Galaxy S25 128GB and Galaxy S25 Ultra 256GB, with Sky offering incentives like a free pair of Galaxy Buds3 Pro with the S25 Edge.

articles.title: No, Atlus Isn't Teasing Persona 6 Yet
articles.author: Kenneth Shepard
articles.summary: Atlus is releasing Persona 5: The Phantom X, a mobile spin-off of Persona 5, worldwide. The game, already in beta in China since 2024, features turn-based combat, social simulation, gacha mechanics, and a new storyline with a different group of high school students.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Galaxy S25 Edge, the New Slim Phone with ₹12,000 Off – Limited Pre-Order Benefit
articles.author: Zimble Digital
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and a 200MP camera. A pre-order offer provides a ₹12,000 discount and a storage upgrade, available until May 26 through Samsung's official store.

articles.title: Naked Sundays Launched Blush & Bronzer SPF 50 Sticks & I'm Obsessed
articles.author: Rachel Lapidos
articles.summary: Naked Sundays launched Blush & Bronze Glow Balms SPF 50, multitasking makeup sticks with mineral-based SPF. Founder Samantha Brett aimed to create a product that delivers color, skin-nourishing ingredients, and sun protection. The balms come in three shades and contain collagen-stimulating peptides, antioxidant-rich cacao seed, and hydrating vitamin E.

articles.title: synergEV Selects Dodona Analytics to Support Their Worry-Free Charging Mission
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: synergEV has selected Dodona Analytics Ltd.'s Chargepoint Planning Platform (CPP) to bolster their 'One Stop for Everything EV Charging' service. This integration suggests an enhancement or expansion of synergEV's existing service offerings in the EV charging sector.

articles.title: ByHeart Launches Anywhere Pack: A First-of-Its-Kind Travel-Ready Infant Formula for Modern Parents
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: ByHeart, an infant nutrition company, launched the Anywhere Pack, a compact and pre-portioned infant formula designed for convenient on-the-go feeding. The Anywhere Pack aims to provide a mess-free feeding solution for parents.

articles.title: Smartpress Debuts New AI Agent: Smartpress Intelligence
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Smartpress.com launched Smartpress Intelligence, a new AI tool designed to help clients configure print projects with expert recommendations and real-time pricing. The tool leverages Smartpress' existing resources to provide accurate recommendations and customization options, aiming to improve the overall customer experience.

articles.title: Google changes its 'G' logo for the first time in a decade - can you spot the difference?
articles.author: WILIAM HUNTER
articles.summary: Google has updated its logo for the first time in a decade, replacing the block colors with a gradient design. This new logo is currently in use for the Google Search app on iOS and Google's Pixel phones. The last time Google updated its design was in 2015.

articles.title: Next's 'cool and comfortable' £28 dress shoppers 'wear all holiday'
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Next is offering a Black V-Neck Ruffle Sleeve Mini Dress with Linen, priced at £28, which has received positive customer feedback for its comfort and versatility. New Look offers a Cream Striped Puffed Sleeve Midi for £35.99, while Nobody's Child features a Burnt Orange Sleeveless Starlight Midi Dress for £82.

articles.title: Slimmer than ever: Samsung unveils thinnest smartphone model
articles.author: M Abdullah Hamid Gul
articles.summary: Samsung launched its thinnest smartphone, the Galaxy S25 Edge, at a Galaxy Unpacked event. The S25 Edge features a 6.7-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a 200-megapixel main camera, and a 3,900 mAh battery, with prices starting at £1099 for the 256GB model.

articles.title: Freshr Sustainable Technologies Inc. (Freshr) Closes Oversubscribed Seed Round
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Freshr is introducing FreshrPack™, an active packaging technology designed to extend the shelf life of fresh proteins using a proprietary coating made from naturally derived ingredients. FreshrPack™ is available in Sheet, Roll, and Bag formats and aims to reduce food waste by inhibiting spoilage bacteria, integrating seamlessly across the fresh food supply chain.

articles.title: Freshr Sustainable Technologies Inc. (Freshr) Closes Oversubscribed Seed Round
articles.author: SUNshine Girl Natalie
articles.summary: Freshr secured seed funding to revolutionize the fresh protein industry with its sustainable active packaging. The company's technology extends the shelf life of fresh fish, reducing food waste and greenhouse gas emissions. This innovative solution addresses economic losses and environmental concerns related to food waste.

articles.title: R29 Editors Share Their Favorite Products From No7
articles.author: Karina Hoshikawa
articles.summary: No7 is introducing and highlighting several skincare and beauty products.  These include the Derm Solutions Daily Lightweight Moisturiser, HydraLuminous+ Hydrating Dual Phase Mask, Future Renew Damage Reversal Serum, Future Renew Day Cream SPF 25, Laboratories Line Correcting Booster Serum and Lash Impact Mascara, each featuring unique ingredients and benefits, with prices ranging from $9.99 to $42.99. The company emphasizes efficacy and results without high costs.

articles.title: FOY Redefines Skincare with Korea's Best, Curated for You
articles.summary: FOY, an Indian beauty discovery platform, launched its Korea campaign to introduce curated Korean skincare innovations to India. The campaign provides Indian consumers first access to sought-after Korean beauty products from brands like Dr. Althea, Medicube, and COSRX through FOY's Global Store.

articles.title: We tried chicken nuggets from 6 fast-food chains and ranked them from worst to best
articles.author: prajput@businessinsider.com
articles.summary: Taco Bell reintroduced its chicken nuggets starting April 24 and plans to make crispy chicken a permanent menu item by 2026. The brand's latest menu drop involves chicken nuggets, aiming to capitalize on chicken's popularity, especially among Gen Z diners.

articles.title: Forethought Pioneers First Multi-Agent, Omnichannel AI for Customer Experience — Raises Strategic Round to Scale Breakthrough Innovation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Forethought introduced a multi-agent, omnichannel AI for customer experience. This allows enterprises to deploy AI agents across various channels like chat, email, voice, and SMS. The AI solution supports functions including customer service, sales, marketing, and account management.

articles.title: Introducing Square Handheld: A Pocketable Powerhouse to Serve Tables, Manage Inventory, and Close Sales Anywhere
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Square launched Square Handheld on May 13, 2025, a portable point-of-sale device. The device features a sleek design and comprehensive software, enabling sellers to manage various operations.

articles.title: Lynkwell Launches EVSE-360™ All-in-One EV Charging Investment Protection Plan with Full Value Coverage and Revenue Reimbursement
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lynkwell, a U.S.-based EV charging solutions provider, launched EVSE-360™. This new offering combines Lynkwell's software platform with end-to-end warranty protection.

articles.title: Square Releases is Here: Built for Sellers to Discover What's New and Shape What's Next
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Square launched Square Releases on May 13, 2025. Square Releases is a biannual product launch. This event delivers new features and tools for businesses, aiming to help them grow.

articles.title: Square Powers Restaurant Growth with New Handheld Device and Next Generation Food and Beverage Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Square introduced new hardware and software designed for restaurants. The new point-of-sale device is more powerful and portable. These innovations are part of Square Releases, a twice-yearly product launch.

articles.title: Fast Buds Announces New Website Domain: Now at FastBuds.com for a Streamlined Experience
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Fast Buds has launched a new website, fastbuds.com, to enhance user experience and accessibility to their premium cannabis genetics. This change aims to simplify navigation and provide growers with easy access to cannabis seeds, expert advice, and support. The website offers streamlined navigation and an optimized browsing experience for both seasoned cultivators and first-time growers.

articles.title: Custom .NET Development Company: Unlock Tailored Software Solutions Fo
articles.summary: Abto Software is presented as a provider of custom .NET applications, known for delivering secure and scalable solutions. They have a proven track record of helping clients enhance operational efficiency by providing tailored software. The future trends in custom .NET development include incorporating AI-powered analytics, IoT sensors, and cloud-native deployments to enhance user experience.

articles.title: Get Samsung S25 Edge with huge storage freebie in pre-order deal
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its newest flagship mobile, the Galaxy S25 Edge, an upgrade from the S25 range, featuring a sleek design with a 5.8mm chassis and the same Snapdragon 8 Elite processor as the S25 series. It's available for pre-order in the UK at retailers like Samsung, Sky, and EE, with prices starting from £1,099, higher than the standard S25 launch price, and is currently on pre-sale for UK shoppers.

articles.title: Trinny London bronzer now under £5 in huge deal that saves £170 on summer beauty
articles.author: Laura Mulley
articles.summary: OK! Beauty Box has released a limited-edition Summer Beauty Box containing 12 products, including brands like Trinny London and Nuxe, worth over £220 but sold for £49.99. The box includes full-size and travel-size items such as Hello Sunday Sun Stick, Trinny London bronzer, and Nuxe Huile Prodigieuse Or Florale.

articles.title: Vonage Fuels Entrepreneurial Innovation with Robust Enablement of Next-Gen APIs
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Vonage has announced a redesigned Vonage Startup Program aimed at empowering emerging businesses. The program provides access to Vonage APIs for voice, video, verification, messaging, Network APIs, and Rich Communication Services (RCS). It includes a tiered credit system, mentorship, onboarding support, and training on Vonage APIs.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launched: Top specs, India price, features and everything else you need to know
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone in India, positioned between the S25 Plus and S25 Ultra. The S25 Edge features a 6.7-inch Quad HD+ AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a 200-megapixel main camera, and runs Android 15 with One UI 7, with prices starting at Rs 1,09,990.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge brings with it the New Galaxy Club – which is really just a new way to pay for your phone
articles.author: Jamie Richards
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, a new thin and light version of its Galaxy S25 smartphone. Alongside the new phone, Samsung unveiled the New Galaxy Club, a new payment plan for Galaxy handsets that varies depending on the region, offering options like Samsung Care+ protection and potential credit for future upgrades.

articles.title: 38 Must-Have Products To Solve Chaotic Problems
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new consumer products including The Pink Stuff all-purpose cleaner, Mouthwatchers' flossing toothbrush, Good Molecules Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, and Catrice "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. Additionally, Blue Bottle is launching New Orleans–inspired instant coffee packets, and Bissell introduces a multipurpose portable cleaner. Finally Anua launches heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil.

articles.title: nubia Z70S Ultra and nubia Pad Pro Released Globally, AI Dual-Flagship Redefines the Mobile Experience
articles.author: Nubia Technology Co.
articles.summary: nubia has launched its new flagship product, the nubia Z70S Ultra. The company also announced the nubia Pad Pro, which will be launched at a later date. These new products aim to offer users a smarter, more professional experience with mobile productivity.

articles.title: Spotnana Announces Spotnana Cloud for TMCs
articles.author: Spotnana
articles.summary: Spotnana launched Spotnana Cloud for TMCs on May 13, 2025. This product suite is designed for travel management companies to boost operational efficiency, enhance customer experiences, and accelerate innovation.

articles.title: Google unveils first ‘G' logo redesign in 10 years with bold gradient look
articles.summary: Google has refreshed its 'G' logo with a smooth, modern gradient, replacing the solid color blocks from the 2015 design. The updated logo, blending red, yellow, green, and blue tones, is currently visible in the latest Google app updates on iOS and Pixel smartphones, aligning with the visual style of Google's AI-focused products like Gemini.

articles.title: AI Infra Startup Flam Raises $14 Million in Series A Round Led by RTP Global
articles.author: Naman Bansal
articles.summary: Flam, an AI infrastructure startup, has raised $14 million to accelerate its mission of redefining consumer engagement. The company plans to launch new GenAI-powered products like a 3D asset generation tool and an integrated advertising suite. This will allow Flam to expand its services across North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia.

articles.title: Get 28% off the The ghd Original Hair Straightener
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: Amazon UK offers a 28% discount on the ghd Original Hair Straightener & Styler for a limited time, reducing the price to £99.99. The upgraded styler features new generation single-zone ceramic technology and ensures a consistent temperature, suitable for all hair types, with a focus on sleek and smooth styling with enhanced shine. The product also comes in fully recyclable outer packaging.

articles.title: Justin Bieber Announcement Includes Telling Hailey Bieber Detail
articles.author: Kevin Harrish
articles.summary: Justin Bieber's new brand Skylrk is launching a new product line that includes sweatshirts, slip-on shoes, sunglasses, and a phone case. The phone case design, which features a compartment for holding a joint, is reminiscent of Hailey Bieber's Rhode Beauty phone cases, suggesting a potential collaboration or inspiration between the two brands.

articles.title: McDonald's Taiwan introduces mobile ordering  May. 13, 2025 11:35
articles.summary: McDonald's Taiwan is launching a mobile ordering feature on May 19, with nationwide availability by late June. The service, accessible through the McDonald's app, will allow customers to skip lining up and select pickup options like dine-in, takeout, and drive-through. Starting in July, the app will integrate the existing McDelivery service, enabling users to order food, redeem promotions, and earn rewards.

articles.title: Google just made setting up its TVs a breeze — here's why Samsung should copy it
articles.author: Ryan Epps
articles.summary: Google TV is rolling out an update featuring a simplified setup process via QR code, initially available on Hisense U7QG and U8QG Mini-LED TVs, and expanding to other devices in 2025. This new process streamlines app installation and smart home device connection compared to previous methods and potentially competing systems like Samsung's Tizen.

articles.title: Samsung launches slimmest smartphone to compete with Apple
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its slimmest flagship smartphone, the Galaxy S25 Edge, with advanced features like multimodal AI and a 200MP primary camera. The Galaxy S25 Edge will be available starting May 23 in South Korea and May 30 in the United States, with a base price of $1,099.

articles.title: LG Energy Solution launches open tech platform for startups
articles.author: 저항 금기 해방
articles.summary: LG Energy Solution has launched the Open Submission for Start-up (OSS) program, enabling startups to submit technology proposals year-round in areas like materials, cells, and battery management systems. Selected companies may receive joint R&D opportunities, equity investment, production support, or technology licensing from LG Energy Solution. Publicly listed companies will also be eligible to join the platform from the second half of this year.

articles.title: Samsung unveils thinnest model EVER with Galaxy S25 device measuring just 5.8mm thick - but there's a catch
articles.author: WILIAM HUNTER
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, their thinnest smartphone model ever, featuring a 6.7-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset, and a 200-megapixel main camera. Available for pre-order with an official release on March 30, the S25 Edge starts at £1099 and includes access to Galaxy AI features.

articles.title: MOUNT FRANKLIN FOODS INTRODUCES NEW STUFFED PUFFS GUMMY FUZIONS - A FUN, GREAT TASTING CANDY WITH A UNIQUE TEXTURE
articles.author: LLC
articles.summary: Mount Franklin Foods is launching Stuffed Puffs Gummy Fuzions at the 2025 Sweets & Snacks Expo. Gummy Fuzions feature a sour fruity center covered in soft gummy candy and a crunchy or sour coating.

articles.title: This $10 Gadget Ensures You'll Get Every Drop Out Of Your Favorite Beauty Product
articles.author: Marsha Badger
articles.summary: Amazon is selling a 'toothpaste squeezer,' a small metal device designed to extract the last drop of product from tubes. This easy-to-use gadget compresses tubes with interlocking aluminum gears, pushing the remaining product out and helping users make the most of their tube-packaged items like toothpaste, hair gel, and cosmetics.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launched: 5 things to know about this slim phone
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, its slimmest Galaxy S series phone, after months of anticipation. The smartphone, first showcased at the Galaxy Unpacked event in January, has gained popularity for its design.

articles.title: Microsoft reveals its rejected Start menu redesigns
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.summary: Microsoft is redesigning the Start menu in Windows 11 with a wider design and the ability to disable the recommended feed. This new Start menu, currently being tested with Windows Insiders, offers increased customizability and a phone companion panel for quick access to calls, messages, and files. It is expected to be available for all Windows 11 users in the coming months.

articles.title: I'm a VP of AI product growth at Dropbox. This is my advice to product managers in the age of AI.
articles.author: Ana Altchek
articles.summary: Dropbox is leveraging AI, particularly through tools like Dropbox's Dash, to augment the capabilities of product managers. This involves using AI as a thought partner to expand thinking and make deep work more productive. The goal is to enhance innovation and creative ideas within the company.

articles.title: New Chinese Manus AI agent now free to register
articles.summary: Chinese startup Monica has launched a new release of its Manus AI agent, making it free to register. Manus offers advanced capabilities, including travel planning and financial analysis, operating through text commands to translate instructions into completed tasks and competes with OpenAI's Operator.

articles.title: What is Sun Motors? Find out how you can SAVE and stay safe buying a used car from the 'revolutionary' platform
articles.author: Brijiena Lovelace
articles.summary: Sun Motors has launched a platform designed to simplify the used car buying experience by connecting customers with trusted dealerships. The platform offers features such as advanced search filters, digital checkout, AI-powered enquiry hub, and financing options through partnerships with DSG Finance and Go Car Credit. It provides a diverse catalog of car models and ensures customer safety through verified dealerships.

articles.title: Next's 'simple yet flattering' £28 mini dress 'looks designer'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next has launched the V-Neck Ruffle Sleeve Mini Dress with Linen, priced at £28. The dress is available in various colours and patterns in sizes 6 to 26 and features a v-neck, short ruffled sleeves, and linen-blend fabric.

articles.title: 'Beautiful' £28 Next dress 'looks fantastic under Caribbean sun'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is offering the V-Neck Ruffle Sleeve Mini Dress with Linen, priced at £28, available in various colors, patterns, and sizes.  The dress features a linen-blend fabric, a V-neck, and short ruffled sleeves, with customers praising its comfort, fit, and versatility for summer and beach wear.

articles.title: Next's 'beautiful' £28 dress 'looks fantastic under Caribbean sun'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is promoting its V-Neck Ruffle Sleeve Mini Dress with Linen, priced at £28, which features a linen-blend fabric, V-neck, and short ruffled sleeves. The dress is available in various colours, patterns, and sizes, with customers praising its fit, comfort, and suitability for summer and holiday wear. However, some buyers suggest sizing down due to a looser fit.

articles.title: Google changes logo for first time in 10 years in surprise update – can you spot major difference in the new icon?
articles.author: Sean Keach
articles.summary: Google has updated its 'G' logo for the first time since 2015. The updated 'G' icon has blended colors, aligning with Google's Gemini branding. Other Google logos for apps like Drive, Calendar, Maps, Gmail, Play, Meet, Chrome, and Photos may also be updated to follow suit.

articles.title: Google tests logo redesign with gradient 'G' in app update
articles.author: arabtimes
articles.summary: Google updated its logo on the Google app for Android and iOS devices with a gradient effect. The branding for Google's Gemini AI assistant also includes a slight gradient effect on its star symbol. This update lacks the fanfare of previous branding changes, suggesting a possible test or influence from AI.

articles.title: Northwest coffee chain to make North Augusta its first expansion into South Carolina
articles.author: City
org: North Augusta Board of Zoning Appeals
articles.summary: Dutch Bros. Coffee is planning to open its first location in South Carolina in North Augusta. The store, a drive-thru and walk-up stand, will be located at Edgewood Square and will offer coffee, shakes, smoothies, and other beverages.

articles.title: Google Launches New Initiative To Back Startups Building AI
articles.summary: Google has launched the AI Futures Fund, a new initiative.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Specs, Features, Price, Release Date
articles.author: Julian Chokkattu
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultra-thin and lightweight smartphone, during a virtual Galaxy Unpacked event. Preorders are live, starting at $1,100, and official sales begin on May 30th.

articles.title: Next's £28 mini dress is a 'perfect addition to holiday wardrobe'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is receiving positive feedback for their V-Neck Ruffle Sleeve Mini Dress with Linen, priced at £28. The dress is available in multiple colors and sizes, featuring linen-blend fabric and a versatile design suitable for both casual and formal occasions. Customer reviews highlight its comfort, fit, and suitability for summer and holiday wear.

articles.title: Contentsquare Announces Sense: an AI Agent That Plans and Acts Like an Analyst
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Contentsquare has launched Sense, an AI-powered suite that automates analytics and helps teams improve user experience. It also introduced Data Connect, a solution for data export, and improved Autocapture for mobile to collect app behavioral data. These new products aims to empower faster insights and actions for data teams.

articles.title: [Photo] Samsung Galaxy 5.8mm 'S25 Edge' is unveiled
articles.author: Lee Choong Woo
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics introduced the ultra-slim Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone, featuring a 5.8mm thickness, Corning Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2, and AI functions like 'Real-time Visual AI' and 'Now Brief'. Pre-sales begin on the 14th, with an official Korean release on the 23rd.

articles.title: Vodafone selects 3SS and 3Ready for new group TV solution
articles.author: Jörn Krieger
articles.summary: Vodafone Group selected 3SS and its 3Ready product platform to power the next-generation Vodafone TV user experiences across Vodafone TV markets. The new Vodafone TV platform, based on 3Ready, will be deployed across multiple countries and devices, aiming to deliver a personalized experience.

articles.title: Google developing software AI agent ahead of annual I/O event
articles.summary: Google is preparing to unveil an AI agent designed to assist software developers in all aspects of the software creation process. Additionally, Google might demonstrate the integration of its AI chatbot Gemini with Android XR glasses and headsets. The company also recently released Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (I/O edition) with improved coding capabilities.

articles.title: Nuxe introduces new roll-on format for signature Huile Prodigieuse body oil
articles.author: Faye Bartle
articles.summary: Nuxe has launched a new 60ml Roll On format for its popular Huile Prodigieuse body oil. This new format gives a new delivery method for added precision and accuracy when applying, and the company believes the playful new format will help to attract new customers, especially younger consumers aged 18-34.

articles.title: Google Updates Its 'G' Logo For The First Time In 10 Years, Internet Has Mixed Reactions
articles.author: Bhavya Sukheja
articles.summary: Google has launched a redesigned version of its 'G' logo, featuring a color gradient instead of solid blocks, first appearing on updated iOS and Pixel phones. This is the first major change to the Google logo since September 2015. The redesigned logo aims to modernize Google's look and align with its focus on AI and digital experiences.

articles.title: Nik Naks to launch 'exciting' crisp flavour in first new release for 'a while'
articles.author: Patrick Glover
articles.summary: KP Snacks' brand Nik Naks is launching a new Tangy 'N' Cheese flavor in convenience stores across the UK starting May 28, priced at £1.25. This flavor combines the existing intensely tasty experience with a cheesy twist, being the first new flavor release in a while.

articles.title: AT&T is already discounting the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge by $1,100 off
articles.author: Cesar Cadenas
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge pre-orders are live with AT&T offering a deal where customers can get the phone for free by trading in an eligible device. The phone, launching on May 30, features a slim design with a titanium frame and Corning Gorilla Glass Ceramic 2, with prices starting at $1,099.99.

articles.title: ultra slim smartphone 2025
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge. This flagship smartphone features a slim 5.85mm profile.

articles.title: China's AI Giants Race to Dominate "General Agent" Battlefield as Global Competition Heats Up-钛媒体官方网站
articles.summary: Manus launched the world's first General AI Agent platform, followed by introductions from ByteDance with 'Coze Space', Alibaba with 'Flow State', Baidu with 'XinXiang' and Lenovo with 'Tianxi Personal Super Intelligent Agent'. Other major players such as OpenAI, Claude, and Microsoft have also launched Agent products or development platforms, fueling rapid growth and commercial applications.

articles.title: Google unveils first major update to ‘G' icon in a decade
articles.author: News Desk
articles.summary: Google launched a redesigned 'G' icon, featuring a smooth gradient transition between its signature colors, as part of a broader visual update inspired by its AI direction. The updated logo is currently live in the latest Google Search app update (version 16.18 beta) on Android and iOS. This branding refresh comes as Google seeks to unify its visual identity across platforms amid a growing focus on generative AI and cross-device experiences.

articles.title: A dedicated compartment in AEG's new washing machines
articles.author: MEITAL SHARABI
articles.summary: Miniline, the official importer of AEG, has launched a new series of AEG washing machines in Israel featuring innovative technologies like UniversalDose, a dedicated laundry capsule compartment, and AutoDose, an automatic liquid detergent dosing system. The new series includes models like LF85166QM, LF83944OM, and LF73946OM, each offering unique features and capacities with prices starting from NIS 2,990.

articles.title: Ogury Accelerates Net Zero Strategy with 51toCarbonZero Partnership
articles.author: Ogury LTD
articles.summary: A global adtech leader is innovating in sustainable advertising. This involves deeper data integration, measurable reductions, and new product development to set new standards.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Launched With Ultra Slim Design, Snapdragon 8 Elite Processor : Checkout Price, Specs, Pre-Order Details
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone, featuring a titanium build, 200MP camera, and Galaxy AI. Pre-orders have begun worldwide with sales starting May 23, and it will be available in Titanium Silver, Titanium Jetblack, and Titanium Icyblue. The price starts at $1,099.99 for the 256GB model.

articles.title: ⚡Tech Giant Google To Unveil AI Agent at Its Google I/O Annual Developer Conference: Reuters
articles.summary: Google is preparing to launch a range of new artificial intelligence (AI) tools. This includes a powerful AI agent designed to assist software developers. The company has been previewing these products to select employees and developers.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launched
articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slimmed-down smartphone, with a US release date of May 30 for $1,099. The device features a titanium frame, a 200-megapixel rear camera, and AI capabilities, and is significantly thinner and lighter than the S25 Ultra.

articles.title: Google Revamps Its Iconic ‘G' Logo for the First Time in 10 Years
articles.author: Itishree Sethy
articles.summary: Google has introduced a refreshed 'G' logo, its first major visual update in nearly a decade. The new logo features a fluid gradient blending red, yellow, green, and blue, aligning with Google's AI initiatives like Gemini. The updated logo is currently visible on iOS and some Android devices and is expected to roll out more widely soon.

articles.title: Google changes its ‘G' logo for the first time in 10 years
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Google is introducing a redesigned 'G' logo, its first major update in nearly a decade, featuring a gradient effect reflecting its AI focus. This new logo is currently rolling out to iOS users via the Google Search app and Android devices through the Google app beta version 16.18. The update aligns with Google's recent AI-driven initiatives, potentially extending to other product logos in the future.

articles.title: S25 Edge is Samsung's slimmest flagship yet—with 2 big compromises
articles.summary: Samsung officially introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new flagship phone. The new model features a 6.7-inch OLED display and Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset and AI capabilities. It is a more compact version of the S25 Plus.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launched in India with ultra-slim design- All details
articles.author: Aishwarya Panda
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new ultra-slim smartphone, the Galaxy S25 Edge, featuring a 5.8mm thickness, Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy processor, and on-device AI capabilities. The Galaxy S25 Edge features a dual camera setup, a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X QHD+ display, and is available for pre-order in two storage options, priced at Rs.109999 and Rs.121999.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Galaxy S25 Edge with Ultra-Slim Design, Flagship Features
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new smartphone in its flagship S25 lineup. The S25 Edge features a slim design, a 6.7-inch Quad HD+ AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy processor, and a 200MP main camera. It runs on Android 15 with One UI 7 and includes advanced AI capabilities along with seven years of Android OS and security updates.

articles.title: Google is preparing to unveil AI Agent at its annual developer conference: Reuters reports
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Google is preparing to unveil new AI tools at its developer conference, including an AI agent designed to assist software developers with tasks, coding, and documentation. The company may also showcase the integration of its Gemini AI Chatbot in voice mode with its Android XR glasses and headset, offering a more immersive AI experience.

articles.title: This Shedding Season Give Pet Hair, Bedbugs, Dust Mites and Allergens Eviction Orders with the Latest Jimmy BX7 Pro Max Mattress Vacuum Cleaner
articles.author: Adnkronos
articles.summary: JIMMY has launched the Jimmy BX7 Pro Max, a mattress vacuum cleaner with UV sanitizing and extreme heat technology designed to eliminate bedbugs, dust mites, and allergens. The device is certified by Allergy UK Foundation and is available on JIMMY.EU, Amazon, and other retailers.

articles.title: Samsung debuts slimmest Galaxy S phone
articles.author: Jie Ye-eun
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, its slimmest Galaxy S smartphone, featuring advanced AI capabilities and an ultra-slim design. Preorders started on Wednesday, with an official release date set for May 23 in Korea and China. The smartphone runs on the Galaxy-exclusive Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and is available through the New Galaxy AI Subscription Club.

articles.title: Google Revamps ‘G' Logo For The First Time In 10 Years- Here's How It Looks Now
articles.author: Ashish Kumar Singh
articles.summary: Google introduced a refreshed version of its 'G' logo, featuring a gradient blend of colors. The redesign aligns with the company's modern design language and digital-first strategy, reflecting Google's deeper integration of artificial intelligence across its products, similar to the visual identity of Google Gemini. The updated logo has started appearing for iOS users via the Google Search app and on Pixel phones.

articles.title: Your Galaxy S25 just got beaten by a radically new smartphone from Samsung
articles.author: Dave Snelling
articles.summary: Samsung has officially confirmed the release of the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone featuring a 6.7-inch QHD+ Dynamic AMOLED screen, a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a dual lens camera with a 200MP wide lens. The Galaxy S25 Edge also includes Galaxy AI and is priced starting from £1,099.

articles.title: Google is developing software AI agent ahead of annual conference: Report
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Google demonstrated an AI agent for software development and potentially integrates its Gemini AI chatbot with Android XR glasses and a headset. These demonstrations occurred prior to Google's I/O conference scheduled for May 20 in Mountain View, California.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge unveiled: Check features, specs, price and more
articles.author: Gargi Chaudhry
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, featuring a 5.8mm design, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a 6.7-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2x display. Pre-orders are open, with sales starting on May 23, 2025, and the price begins at $1,099 for the base model. The phone includes a 200MP primary sensor and runs on Android 15-based One UI 7, promising seven OS updates.

articles.title: Google changes its ‘G' logo for the first time in 10 years
articles.author: Smarica Pant
articles.summary: Google is launching a revamped 'G' logo, featuring a gradient design that blends the original colors, replacing the solid blocks. The new logo, designed to align with Google's AI vision, has started rolling out to iOS users through the Google Search app and on some Android devices via the Google app beta version 16.18, predominantly visible on Pixel phones.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launched with Snapdragon 8 Elite and 200 MP camera. Details
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge in global markets, including India, on May 13, 2025. The Galaxy S25 Edge features Galaxy AI and a 6.7-inch QHD+ Dynamic AMOLED 2x display with a 120 Hz refresh rate. This new phone is part of the Galaxy S25 series.

articles.title: Phunware Reports First Quarter 2025 Financial Results  May. 13, 2025 04:05
articles.summary: Phunware launched an integrated conference solution with features like dynamic wayfinding and mobile engagement for a hospitality customer and a hospitality industry solution application for a resort and entertainment venue customer to enhance guest experiences. The company also plans to launch an AI Personal Concierge product in mid-2025 for hospitality customers.

articles.title: Walmart has the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi at its best price, $2 cheaper than anyone ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Ninja introduced its newest ice cream maker. This product is intended as an alternative to visiting ice cream shops, allowing consumers to make ice cream at home.

articles.title: ஒத்திவைக்கப்பட்ட யெஸ்டி அட்வென்சர் வெளியீடு.. ஏன்?
articles.summary: Classic Legends postponed the launch of the updated Yezdi Adventure, which was originally scheduled for May 15. The article discusses the reasons for this postponement.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge launched: Price, full specs, features and other details
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim flagship smartphone featuring a 6.7-inch Quad HD+ AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy processor, and a 200-megapixel main camera. The phone runs Android 15 with One UI 7 and includes new AI features, offering seven generations of Android updates.

articles.title: Can ChatGPT's new Shopping Assistant find the perfect white shirt? I asked it to find out
articles.author: Sarah Maisey
articles.summary: ChatGPT launched a new service called Shopping Assistant. The service aims to curate online shopping results by generating shortlists of relevant items based on user prompts. It provides prices, links to retailers like Matalan, VogaCloset, Sun & Sand Sports, Amazon, and Zara, and offers styling advice.

articles.title: When packaging talks, who's listening?
articles.summary: Maggi launched Vegetable Atta noodles with new packaging, highlighting wheat and peas to denote a healthier option. Wickedgüd emphasizes ingredient storytelling by displaying key ingredients, protein, and fiber content upfront on their multi-grain noodles. Similarly, Open Secret uses playful and informative packaging, featuring an asterisk next to 'Unjunked' to explain its cleaner ingredients.

articles.title: Google Updates Iconic 'G' Logo After Nearly 10 Years
articles.author: Imad Khan
articles.summary: Google has updated its "G" logo after nearly 10 years, introducing a gradient effect instead of separated color blocks. The updated logo is currently appearing on the Google Search iOS app store page.

articles.title: Watch the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Announcement Live: Global Debut of Samsung's Slimmest Flagship
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch the Galaxy S25 Edge, touted as the slimmest phone in its flagship lineup, on May 13th. The phone features a 6.7-inch Quad HD+ AMOLED panel, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a 200MP main camera, initially launching in Korea and China before expanding to other global markets.

articles.title: Miss the Galaxy S25 Edge unveil? Watch the full reveal here
articles.author: Trevor Mogg
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, its thinnest Galaxy S series smartphone, during an online presentation on May 12th. Led by Hubert Lee, the presentation highlighted the phone's slim and lightweight design, measuring 5.8mm thick and weighing 163 grams.

articles.title: Yellow Balloon revamp customer review function and 'New customer review! 'Point Payment Event' will ..
articles.author: The God
articles.summary: Yellow Balloon has launched a revamped customer review function featuring AI-based summary technology. The updated feature allows users to automatically summarize and classify reviews with key keywords, enhanced by photo and video attachments. Yellow Balloon is also holding a 'New customer review! 'Point Payment Event' till the end of the month where users can gain points for writing reviews.

articles.title: 51 Products You Won't Just Normal Like, You'll Really Like
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro introduced Brazilian Bum Bum Cream with cupuaçu butter, coconut oil, and açai oil which hydrates the skin. Anua launched Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil to erase blackheads and sebaceous filaments. Tineco created 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop to both vacuum and mop at the same time. COSRX released Snail Mucin Repairing Essence formulated with 96% snail sludge to hydrate skin.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics Unveils Ultra-slim Galaxy S25 Edge with 5.8mm Thickness
articles.author: Editor
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone on May 13, featuring an ultra-slim design, advanced camera capabilities, and Galaxy AI-based editing functions. The device will be available in three colors and launched officially on May 23, with pre-sales from May 14-20, offering a double storage benefit and other content subscriptions.

articles.title: Samsung unveils Galaxy S25 Edge: 5.8mm thin, 200MP camera, hits US stores May 30 for $1,099
articles.author: Maria
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new smartphone with a slim design and advanced features, at a virtual Unpacked event on May 13, 2025. The Galaxy S25 Edge features a 200-megapixel primary camera, a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and is priced at $1,099 for the 256GB model, and will be available in the United States on May 30. This launch reflects Samsung's strategy to innovate in the competitive smartphone market.

articles.title: Samsung Debuts Its Slimmest Galaxy Phone Yet: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge, its thinnest smartphone yet. Information about preordering the phone is available.

articles.title: AT&T is already discounting the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge by $1,100 off
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: AT&T is offering free Galaxy S25 Edge phones with an eligible trade-in as part of a new deal related to the live preorders of the product.

articles.title: Blurry Vision: Why We're Giggling at Google's ‘G' Whiz Redesigned Logo
articles.author: Warren Squire
articles.summary: Google has refreshed its 'G' logo design for the first time in a decade, marking a significant update to its branding. The new logo flows from color to color. Walmart also rebranded their logo few months ago, and this redesign was similar to the Google's redesign.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics' ultra-slim smartphone "Galaxy S25 Edge" has finally been unveiled.On the 13th, ..
articles.author: unwritten
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultra-slim smartphone featuring a 5.8mm thickness, a 200-megapixel camera, and the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset. Available in three colors with 256GB and 512GB storage options, it will officially launch in Korea on the 23rd, with pre-sales starting on the 14th, offering benefits such as double storage and subscriptions.

articles.title: New Honor Phone Beats Google Pixel to Cutting-Edge AI Feature
articles.author: Rob Le Febvre
articles.summary: Honor is launching its new 400 series phone, which includes an AI-generated video feature powered by Google's Veo 2 model. This feature allows users to create videos from still images, and the phone will be available starting May 22nd.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: How To Get The New Phone For Free
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge smartphone, featuring a 5.8mm thin design, titanium build, and a 200-megapixel wide lens camera. AT&T is offering a limited-time trade-in deal where customers can get the phone for free with an eligible trade-in. The phone is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Mobile Platform for Galaxy.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Arrives May 30 And The Price Is Right
articles.author: Mitch Wallace
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge, a mega-thin smartphone, available for pre-order with distribution starting May 30. The S25 Edge features a 5.8mm thin design, a 200MP camera, and a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, with prices starting at $1,099 for the 256GB model.

articles.title: The Best Ebook Reader Definitely Isn't A Kindle
articles.author: Barry Collins
articles.summary: The Boox Palma 2, an Android-based ebook reader, offers versatility beyond the limitations of Kindle devices, including access to multiple ebook stores and library ebooks. The Boox Palma 2 features include supporting apps such as Spotify and document scanning, enhancing the reading experience compared to the Kindle.

articles.title: What Every Leader Should Know About Building Their First AI Agent
articles.author: Aytekin Tank
articles.summary: Amazon launched its AI agent, Nova Act, joining Salesforce and Microsoft in offering AI agent solutions. AI agents are described as a major tech development since ChatGPT, with the potential to streamline operations and unlock value across industries, however, deploying them overnight is not recommended.

articles.title: Samsung's S25 Edge is a thin phone with two big tradeoffs
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slimmed-down version of the S25 Plus, with a 6.7-inch OLED display and Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset and AI features. Preorders are open now ahead of an official release on May 30th, and the phone costs $1,099.99 for a model with 256GB storage, and $1,219.99 for 512GB.

articles.title: Pop-Tarts ice cream sandwiches are coming to a grocery store freezer near you
articles.author: Michigan Live
articles.summary: Kellanova, formerly the Kellogg Company, has partnered with Golden West Food Group to launch Pop-Tarts ice cream sandwiches. This new product follows the successful rollout of Eggo and Rice Krispies variations.

articles.title: Tata Altroz facelift in pics: A new look with upgraded features
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Tata is introducing a facelift for its Altroz model. This update includes a new look and upgraded features for the car.

articles.title: Iconic car loved by UK drivers is reinvented as hybrid boasting 6-speed gearbox, huge storage ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Fiat revealed the first look of its New 500 Hybrid through photographs of pre-release prototypes. The company assembled the first pre-production units at their Mirafiori plant. Production is set to begin later this year.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge: Specs, Features, Price, Release Date
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: The Galaxy S25 Edge presents a design choice, prompting consideration between a slim profile and enhanced battery performance. It is either an announcement, launch or prototype of a new phone.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics unveils ultra-slim Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled its new Galaxy A55 smartphone on Tuesday.

articles.title: Slim, Light and Free: New Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge at T-Mobile Delivers Power and Perks
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: T-Mobile announced the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge. The Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is a new slim and light device.

articles.title: nubia Z70S Ultra and nubia Pad Pro Released Globally, AI Dual-Flagship Redefines the Mobile Experience
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: nubia is launching a new product. The launch was announced on May 13, 2025, in Shenzhen, China.

articles.title: Sony's New Xperia 1 VII Smartphone Looks Amazing but Won't Come to US
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Sony has unveiled the Sony Xperia 1 VII, its latest flagship smartphone.

articles.title: Tragal Launches AI Agent Platform Integrating ChatGPT, Claude, and Grok
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: A company has launched its AI Agent platform, which unifies advanced language models into a single interface. This platform supports AI Agents, chatbots, lead generation, and customer service automation. The platform is presented as a solution to bring together top large language models.

articles.title: Hands-On With the Ultra-Thin Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Samsung is developing the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new premium smartphone designed to be the company's lightest in years and to be unapologetically thin.

articles.title: The Android Show Live Blog: Android 16 Reveals Are Coming to Google's New Livestream
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google is revealing its new Android 16 during a dedicated livestream event.

articles.title: Thinner than a credit card: Samsung's S25 Edge raises the stakes before Apple's 'iPhone Air' ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge is now available for preorder. The device is the brand's thinnest and lightest flagship model to date.

articles.title: (LEAD) Samsung Electronics unveils ultra-slim Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co. unveiled its new GaN power semiconductor on Tuesday, May 13.

articles.title: Samsung unveils Galaxy S25 Edge, setting new standard for slimness
articles.author: Korea Times
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics introduced the Galaxy S25 Edge, the latest addition to the Galaxy lineup, featuring the thinnest design in the Galaxy S series. The S25 Edge aims to compete with Apple and other smartphone makers.

articles.title: Samsung unveils new AI-enhanced Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new artificial intelligence-powered flagship smartphone. The device is 5.8mm thick and weighs 163 grams.

articles.title: Sandisk unveils WD_Black SSDs that balance performance and power efficiency
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: SanDisk introduced the WD_BLACK SN8100 NVMe SSD, a new solid state drive with PCIe Gen 5.0. This SSD is designed for improved performance in gaming, content creation, and AI workloads.

articles.title: Google unveils big Android redesign ahead of iPhone overhaul
articles.author: Vlad Savov
articles.summary: Google unveiled a major update to its Android mobile operating system featuring a new design language called Material. This update comes before Apple's expected preview of its updated iPhone software.

articles.title: Android 16 Is Getting a Facelift, and Gemini Is Rolling Onto More Google Platforms
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Google announced upcoming new features for its mobile operating system. This announcement was made in anticipation of the I/O conference next week.

articles.title: Ahead of thinnest iPhone launch, Samsung unveils its slimmest flagship yet: AI-powered S25 Edge — ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics introduced the S25 Edge, its slimmest flagship model. The new model incorporates enhanced AI technology.

articles.title: No, Atlus Isn't Teasing Persona 6 Yet
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: ATLUS Games will launch Persona 5: The Phantom X, a mobile spin-off game, worldwide. The game is set in an alternate timeline to the original Persona 5.
